attributes.action: change current music that is streamed in lifts to death metal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some times having to use a lift can be slightly anoying, the music that is currently played in most of the lifts is quite...bland and makes the whole lift journey all the more anoying.

Well how can we fix this issue you ask?

Lets change the current music to death/thrash metal.. how much more satisfying would this be? it could actually improve the experiance within a lift twice as much.

On a personal note..getting stuck in a lift is like torture and the current music does not help at all when good things go bad...

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
